title: Keep It On Me
lyrics:
Shun On Da Beat
On me
Ah-ha
On me, on me, on me
On me, on me, on me, on me

I- I- I came a long (Long) way (Way)

The strong (Strong) way (Way)

I been grind- (Grind-) in' (In’)

All (All) day (Day)

Pi-pi- picked the wrong (Wrong) day (Day)

I ain't tryin' to play (Play)

I- I- I ain’t fuckin' wit' 'em

Tried to cross (Cross) me (Me)

Ke- ke- keep it on me, on- on- on me

On me, on- on me

Keep it on me, on- on- on me

On me, on me



Hey, fuck you and who cappin' wit' ya

What you stand for and who vouchin' with ya

Nigga talkin' tough I hope you got your pencil

Fuckin’ rat, spaz out and I’ll slap a nigga (Slap a nigga)

Rat-ass nigga, call him Master Splinter

Play with me if you wanna knock out your dentals

And I don't give a motherfuck if you got your niggas

’Cause I'll shoot everybody that's ridin' with ya (Ridin’ with ya)

Wo- word on the street is sayin' I'm that nigga

If they say otherwise I gotta find that nigga (Find that nigga)

Hit 'em with the buck and blam then I'll hide that nigga (That nigga)

Bright light from the beam and blind that nigga (That nigga)

Take it to the head like shots of liquor

I'ma hit whoever rockin' with ya

Not Lil Baby but it's "4 Pockets", nigga

Tha- tha- that's filled up with lots of scrilla

Tryin' to get me some cash (Cash)

Yeah I had to run up them digits (Digits)

I had to sit down and go listen (Go listen)

I'm tryin' to make better decisions (Decisions)

If a jacka come at me I'm blitzin' (Blitzin')

I'ma hit a nigga wit' a blizzy (Nigga wit' a blizzy)

Clip extended, the whole fifty (The whole fifty)

And I ain't leavin' none witness (Leavin' none witness)



I came a long (Long) way (Way)

The strong (Strong) way (Way)

I been grind- (Grind-) in' (In')

All (All) day (Day)

Pi-pi- picked the wrong (Wrong) day (Day)

I ain't tryin' to play (Play)

I- I- I ain't fuckin' wit' 'em

Tried to cross (Cross) me (Me)

Ke- ke- keep it on me, on- on- on me

On me, on- on me

Keep it on me, on- on- on me

On me, on me



Before the hold of dirty-dirty

I hope that bitch servin', woke up too early

Don't take off my jewelry, say I got no worries

You can't move too much, said it make me nervous

Every day I'm splurgin', stunt hard on purpose

Sippin' color purple, got a cup of purple

Bad bitch aversion, I need another virgin

Nigga washed up like a box of detergent

And all you pussy nigga really do is bump herpes

Thi- thi- this baby chopper gonna pop perfect

Nigga shit talks and I'm not worried

Last nigga I shot he got buried

The- these niggas talk and they not serious

Yo, where my attitude said if I got serious

Nigga cuffin' that hoe she about pearlies

And she gon' gimme that top surely

I'm gonna get me some cash (Cash)

Yeah I had to run up them digits (Digits)

I had to sit down and go listen (Go listen)

I'm tryin' to make better decisions (Decisions)

If a jacka come at me I'm blitzin' (Blitzin')

I'ma hit a nigga wit' a blizzy (Nigga wit' a blizzy)

Clip extended, the whole fifty (The whole fifty)

And I ain't leavin' none witness (Leavin' none witness)



I came a long (Long) way (Way)

The strong (Strong) way (Way)

I been grind- (Grind-) in' (In')

All (All) day (Day)

Pi-pi- picked the wrong (Wrong) day (Day)

I ain't tryin' to play (Play)

I- I- I ain't fuckin' wit' 'em

Tried to cross (Cross) me (Me)

Ke- ke- keep it on me, on- on- on me

On me, on- on me

Keep it on me, on- on- on me

On me, on me (Shun On Da Beat)



Shun On Da Beat
